pair.t: Google files for its long awaited IPO.
pair.h: Google goes public.

pair.t: The party of chancellor Gerhard Schroeder scored its worst electoral performance since the war at the June 13 European election and performed poorly at a simultaneous vote in Thuringia state.
pair.h: Schroeder's party didn't do well at the European elections.

pair.t: A former police officer was charged with murder Thursday in the slaying of a college student who allegedly had threatened to expose their sexual relationship, authorities said.

pair.t: Security preparations kept protestors at bay at the recent G8 Summit on Sea Island (USA).

pair.t: The G8 summit, held June 8-10, brought together leaders of the world's major industrial democracies, including Canada, France, Germany, Italy, Japan, Russia, United Kingdom, European Union and United States.

pair.t: Congress president Sonia Gandhi has been allotted a separate office here as head of the national advisory panel for India's ruling coalition.

pair.t: MSF, a neutral group which depends primarily on private donations, has a reputation for sending medical staff into troublespots regarded by other agencies as too dangerous.

pair.t: EU membership is a strategic necessity for Turkey, as Ankara will inevitably suffer greater foreign policy problems in the future unless it makes it into the Union.

pair.t: But even in light of this unparalleled decline, the SPD's result in the June 13 European elections is of a qualitatively different character.

pair.h: Schroeder was elected in 1998.

pair.t: In his three years in exile in Washington, Aristide has been protected by the Secret Service 24 hours a day. And during his last week in exile, amid frenzied preparations for his return to Haiti, Aristide took time out to thank the Americans who helped his Administration.
pair.h: Aristide is going back to Haiti after being exiled for years.

pair.h: In 1984 the Olympic games were held in Sarajevo.
